CustomField.description: Name of the Service, an implementation of which we are looking to invoke. Note that we use the Service name rather than a lookup as the Service may not be configured in all environments, in which case a stub method should be used.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Name of the Service, an implementation of which we are looking to invoke. Note that we use the Service name rather than a lookup as the Service may not be configured in all environments, in which case a stub method should be used.
CustomField.label: Service Name
